mysql.name: select_t_sku_HomePage
mysql.sql: select r.id resourceId,r.corner_mask specificType ,tsc.PIC_PATH bannerUrl,tsc.PIC_PATH thumbUrl,r.resource_type_id resourceType,r.title,tsc.POSITION position,min(s.price) minPrice ,max(s.price) originalPrice from resource.t_resource r LEFT JOIN resource.t_sku s on r.id = s.resource_id,allin.t_show_config tsc where ((r.state = 0 and r.resource_type_id in(1,2)) or (r.state = 0 and r.resource_type_id = 11 and EXISTS(select 1 from resource.t_sku s where s.resource_id = r.id and s.inventory>0 and s.state = 0) ) or (r.state = 0 and r.resource_type_id = 12 and EXISTS(select 1 from resource.t_sku s where s.resource_id = r.id and s.inventory>0 and s.state = 0) and EXISTS(select 1 from resource.t_time_slot ts where r.time_slot_id = ts.id and ts.end_time>now()) )) and tsc.POSITION in(%(position)s) and tsc.ITEM_ID = r.id group by r.id,tsc.POSITION order by tsc.LIST_ORDER ;

mysql.name: select_t_resource_calculate
mysql.sql: select r.id resourceId,r.corner_mask specificType ,r.banner_url bannerUrl,r.banner_url thumbUrl,r.resource_type_id resourceType,r.title,"%(position)s" position,min(s.price) minPrice,max(price) originalPrice,(count(1) + r.base_visit_count) visistnum from resource.t_resource r left join resource.t_visit v on v.resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN resource.t_sku s on s.resource_id = r.id where ((r.state = 0 and r.resource_type_id in(1,2,13)) or (r.state = 0 and r.resource_type_id = 11 and EXISTS(select 1 from resource.t_sku s where s.resource_id = r.id and s.inventory>0 and s.state = 0) ) or (r.state = 0 and r.resource_type_id = 12 and EXISTS(select 1 from resource.t_sku s where s.resource_id = r.id and s.inventory>0 and s.state = 0) and EXISTS(select 1 from resource.t_time_slot ts where r.time_slot_id = ts.id and ts.end_time>now()) )) and not EXISTS(select 1 from allin.t_show_config ttc where ttc.POSITION = %(position)s and ttc.item_id = r.id ) group by r.id order by visistnum desc;
mysql.desc: 首页发现页算法计算数据

mysql.name: select_t_resource_calculate_inovn
mysql.sql: select r.id resourceId,r.corner_mask specificType ,r.banner_url bannerUrl,r.banner_url thumbUrl,r.resource_type_id resourceType,r.title,"%(position)s" position,min(s.price) minPrice,max(price) originalPrice,(count(1) + r.base_visit_count) visistnum from resource.t_resource r left join resource.t_visit v on v.resource_id = r.id LEFT JOIN t_sku s on s.ITEM_ID = r.id where r.state = 0 and r.resource_type_id in(1,2) and r.match_id = 1 and not EXISTS(select 1 from allin.t_show_config ttc where ttc.POSITION = %(position)s and ttc.item_id = r.id ) group by r.id order by visistnum desc
mysql.desc: 创新大赛推荐位计算数据
